text: Ant-Man is a 2015 superhero comedy movie based on the Marvel Comics character of the same name. It is the twelfth movie of the Marvel Cinematic Universe. It was directed by Peyton Reed and written by Edgar Wright, Paul Rudd and Adam McKay. ==Plot== Prisoner Scott Lang has been picked by Hank Pym to be the next Ant-Man. ==Cast== * Paul Rudd as Scott Lang/Ant-Man * Evangeline Lilly as Hope van Dyne * Michael Douglas as Hank Pym * Michael Pe√±a as Luis * Anthony Mackie as Falcon ==Production== Edgar Wright was contacted to direct an Ant-Man movie but left during shooting because he had creative differences with Kevin Feige. Paul Rudd and Adam McKay wrote additional dialogue for reshoots. ==Reception== Ant-Man was an unexpected success and did well at the box office. ==Sequel== The movie had a 2018 sequel with the cast and crew returning called Ant-Man and the Wasp. == References == Category:2015 comedy movies Category:2010s superhero movies Category:American action comedy movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:Marvel Cinematic Universe: Phase Two movies Category:Movies set in 1987 Category:Superhero comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Peyton Reed
title: Ant-Man (movie)
